system.requirement: After you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.725a21e2f02d7e12]{Fulfill Your Vow} to a shaman and @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond} with them to train you...

abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +wits or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4244b77103f55bc4]{Gather Information} by entering a trance to communicate with the spiritual realm, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.be95ca063ded2b19]{Compel}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond}, or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.421b379cb40b6ab7]{Test Your Bond} leveraging information gained from the above communion with the spiritual realm, add +1 and take +1 spirit on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} or Face Desolation, you may offer yourself to the ancestral spirits. If you do, add +2 and treat a strong hit as a weak hit.
